Uses of Package
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad

  • Packages that use com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad 
    Package Description
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api
    Provides the top-level Fluvius API.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.logging
    Logging API for Flow execution.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad
    Defines the "scratchpad" abstraction which represents the working state of a Flow.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.conditions
    Contains classes for working with Conditions.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.describers
    Defines a FlowVisitor which constructs a FlowDescription from a Flow, and a PrettyPrintingDescriptionWriter which can pretty-print it to a String.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.exceptions
    Defines some custom exceptions emitted by Flows.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows
    Provides the fluent Flow-creation and execution API, for which the public entry-point is the Flows class.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.predicates
    Provides a utility class for constructing predicates.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.scratchpad
    Provides a concrete implementation of Scratchpad, together with the Scratchpads class for creating new Scratchpads.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.api 
    Class and Description
    Key
    A Key identifies a value written into a Scratchpad, and is used to construct new key/value pairs to be added to a Scratchpad.
    Scratchpad
    An immutable collection of Key/value pairs.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.logging 
    Class and Description
    Key
    A Key identifies a value written into a Scratchpad, and is used to construct new key/value pairs to be added to a Scratchpad.
    Scratchpad
    An immutable collection of Key/value pairs.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad 
    Class and Description
    Key
    A Key identifies a value written into a Scratchpad, and is used to construct new key/value pairs to be added to a Scratchpad.
    KeyValue
    A pair of a Key and an associated value, which may be added to a Scratchpad's storage.
    Scratchpad
    An immutable collection of Key/value pairs.
    ScratchpadStorage
    Used to provide write-only access to a Scratchpad's storage for a KeyValue.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.conditions 
    Class and Description
    Key
    A Key identifies a value written into a Scratchpad, and is used to construct new key/value pairs to be added to a Scratchpad.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.scratchpad used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.describers

    Key
